https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Following his nose, George sniffs his way to Chef Pisghetti's Ristorante where he finds Gnocchi the cat./After George's success helping Chef Pisghetti impress a restaurant critic, the Chef suggests that George help his friend Mr. Glass wash the windows of his skyscraper--The Glass Palace.
